dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:1,300,000, 15 Miliaria Germanica communia = 5,2 cm. Relief shown pictorially. Latin text on verso, title:""Islandia"" pp. 43-44. From: Gerardi Mercatoris atlas, sive cosmographicae meditationes de fabrica mundi et fabricati figura. Koeman, 1997, I, pages 582, [1250:1A].|1 map ; 26 x 42 centimeters, on sheet 46 x 57 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:1,300,000, 15 Miliaria Germanica communia = 5,2 centimeters|General Map Collection
